item.title: How To Create A Customized AMI with Packer
item.description: Download Packer Template Validate and Build Download Packer Packer is a lightweight tool that is used to create pre-configured operating systems also called images (AMIs). You can download packer using the link or alternative methods below. https://www.packer.io/downloads.html Alternative methods OSX: brew install packer Windows: choco install packer Template Packer uses templates in the format of JSON in order to configure and create images. variables are necessary so that we can pass our AWS credentials for authentication.
